# Erevan Ilesere
## Overview
Name: Erevan Ilesere

Gender: m

Rank: Intermediate Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Mischief, Change, Rogues

Titles: The Trickster, The Chameleon, The Green Changeling, The Ever-shifting Shapechanger, The Fey Jester, The Jack

of the Seelie Court

Holy Symbol: Nova star with asymmetrical rays

Alignment: CN

Origin of Worship: Elf

Core Worshippers: Elves

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Short sword (m)

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: +1 shock short sword

Domains: Celerity\* (CD), Chaos, Domination\* (CD), Luck, Madness\* (CD), Trickery.
